text: Mayariochloa is a genus of Cuban plants in the grass family.Salariato, Diego L., Osvaldo N. Morrone & Fernando Omar Zuloaga|Zuloaga. 2012. Systematic Botany 37(1): pages 100–111, figure 5Tropicos, Mayariochloa D. Salariato, Morrone & Zuloaga The only known species is Mayariochloa amphistemon, native to central and eastern Cuba.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ==References== Category:Panicoideae Category:Monotypic Poaceae genera Category:Endemic flora of Cuba Category:Grasses of North America
title: Mayariochloa
